name: T'ED
description:
Play as T'Ed, a robot awoken by the ship's main computer after a crash has damaged the Ship and him.

  • Find the missing parts
  • tether yourself to power or go off the grid to risk running out of battery but reach new places.
  • Explore for memory modules to upload  with new movement skills

Do you have what it takes to find all the parts and get home?

MUSIC HAS BEEN COMPLETED BUT IS TO BE ADDED AFTER THE JAM.

________________________________________________

Created for the AGD Slam Jam 2 - 2023, by :

James de Bock - Art

Byron Boskell - Programmer, Level Design

Jemma Hooper - Music

Michael Manson - Designer

_______________________________________________

Controls

WASD to Move

Mouse Look

E to interact with Power

Enter to Interact with Parts

Space to Jump (when learned)

Shift to Dash (when learned)
